name: Ext_R2_TestScript_se_ac_op_resource
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.TestScript.setup.action.operation.resource for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents TestScript.setup.action.operation.resource from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/TestScript|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: The type of the resource.  See http://hl7-fhir.github.io/resourcelist.html.
element.comment: `TestScript.setup.action.operation.resource` maps to R4B `TestScript.setup.action.operation.resource`. The value set relationship of  is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as Equivalent.

element.definition: The type of the resource.  See http://hl7-fhir.github.io/resourcelist.html.
element.comment: `TestScript.setup.action.operation.resource` maps to R4B `TestScript.setup.action.operation.resource`. The value set relationship of  is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as Equivalent.

binding.description: Either a resource or a data type.
